text.Prompt:
Using the item keywords and item title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item title:
Virbac Petrodex 51201 Enzymatic Toothpaste for Dogs - Beef Flavor

Item keywords:
Formulated specifically for dogs
Does not foam
Controls plaque
Fights bad breath
Beef and poultry flavors
text.Response A: Dental health is critical for everyone, even man's best friend.  Petrodex Enzymatic Toothpaste for Dogs is formulated specifically for dogs.  The non-foaming formula helps control plaque and fights bad breath in your pooch.  Offered in poultry or beef flavors, there's something for every pet's palette to ensure acceptance.
text.Response B:
Enzymatic Toothpaste for Dogs
 Virbac Petrodex 51201 Beef Flavor Enzymatic Toothpaste controls plaque and fights bad breath for dogs. The non-foaming formula makes it easy to mix into a cup of water for a drink. It can also be used as a dip for favorite toys. The beef flavor will make this an easy transition for any dog not accustomed to dental products. This toothpaste is formulated specifically for dogs and is a great start to getting your dog on a regular dental routine.

1328.displayed_text:
Prompt

Using the item keywords and item title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item title:
Virbac Petrodex 51201 Enzymatic Toothpaste for Dogs - Beef Flavor

Item keywords:
Formulated specifically for dogs
Does not foam
Controls plaque
Fights bad breath
Beef and poultry flavors

Response A

Dental health is critical for everyone, even man's best friend. Petrodex Enzymatic Toothpaste for Dogs is formulated specifically for dogs. The non-foaming formula helps control plaque and fights bad breath in your pooch. Offered in poultry or beef flavors, there's something for every pet's palette to ensure acceptance.

Response B

Enzymatic Toothpaste for Dogs
Virbac Petrodex 51201 Beef Flavor Enzymatic Toothpaste controls plaque and fights bad breath for dogs. The non-foaming formula makes it easy to mix into a cup of water for a drink. It can also be used as a dip for favorite toys. The beef flavor will make this an easy transition for any dog not accustomed to dental products. This toothpaste is formulated specifically for dogs and is a great start to getting your dog on a regular dental routine.
